posts.content:
I'm arriving by splitbus, from the Netherlands via France, on friday July 26 in Newhaven.
- Any busfriendly campsite recommendations near (the west of) Newhaven are welcome.

For saturday to sunday we have an address near Southampton to camp.
On sunday we start driving east towards to Dover. I'm planning to camp close to the harbour (Kingsdown) on monday to be able to take an early Ferry on tuesday into France.

- Any busfriendly campsite recommendations between Southampton and Dover (Something at the coastline of Worthing / Brighton / Eastbourne) are welcome.
Have a look here Frank , might help http://www.ukcampsite.co.uk/sites/resul ... t%20Sussex
